snippet: The president of the Palestinian Authority spoke with Israel’s justice minister in the first known face-to-face talks between the two sides since peace negotiations collapsed last month.
abstract: Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas meets in London with Tzipi Livni, Israel's justice minister; it is first known face-to-face talks between two sides since American-brokered peace negotiations collapsed in April.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The president of the Palestinian Authority spoke with Israel’s justice minister in the first known face-to-face talks between the two sides since peace negotiations collapsed last month.

headline.main: Abbas Meets in London With Israeli Negotiator
headline.print_headline: Abbas Meets in London With Israeli Negotiator
